tooltipText: At MAPLE, people are key. We want to foster a community as each person provides public testimony to empower policy change. By providing more information about yourself, it helps legislators and others see what your goals are and connect in an impactful way.

content.reqPending: Your request to be an organization account is pending approval
content.uplaodOrgImg: Input an image for your organization's profile
content.error: An error occured. Please refresh the page.

confirmation.unfollowMessage: Are you sure you want to unfollow

email.frequencyQuery: How often would you like to receive emails?

legislator.findToolTip: and select your State Representative and Senator.

forms.notificationText: Would you like to receive updates about bills/organizations you follow through email?
forms.notificationFrequencyText: How often would you like to receive these updates?

contact.phoneLenWarning1: Your phone number should be at least 10 numbers long
contact.phoneLenWarning2: Your phone number can not be more than 10 numbers long
contact.phoneNumWarning: Please enter a phone number that only consists of numbers

testimonies.editTip1: Editing testimony is allowed but users will be able to see edit history.
testimonies.editTip2: Provide an edit reason to inform your fellow users on why you changed a particular stance/message.

privacyText.organization: Your profile is set to public. Others can view your profile page. Organization accounts cannot set their profile to private.
privacyText.pendingUpgrade: Your profile is private until your request to be an Organization account is approved.
privacyText.publicUser: Your profile is currently public. Others can view your profile page.
privacyText.privateUser: Your profile is currently private. Your name is still associated with published testimonies but your profile page is hidden.
